channel.title: Cybersecurity, Cloud and Compiler
channel.description: Insights into Cybersecurity, Cloud computing, and Compiler

item.title: Harnessing AWS IAM and Terraform for Enhanced Cybersecurity
item.description: An old-timer's guide to using Terraform to manage who gets to touch what in your AWS account. Learn about IAM users, policies, groups, and roles without falling asleep.
item.author: nerd@supasaf.com (Supa Safe)

item.title: Terraform and Cybersecurity: A Chill Intro
item.description: An old-timer's take on why managing cloud infrastructure by hand is a security nightmare, and how Terraform can save your bacon.
item.author: nerd@supasaf.com (Supa Safe)
